name: kids story maker
description:
This is a prototype of an educational game that will allow children to create their stories in the form of an illustrated book and share them on a website.

If you wish to create or edit books sign in with:

username: test

password: test

(The prototype graphics are just samples whose sole purpose is to show how the prototype works)

If you want to collaborate as a 2d artist in the creation of the backgrounds, characters, objects and the UI, please contact me here or on Discord: donnadie#4307
